com.mr_apps.androidbase.account

Class SignUpElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr_apps.androidbase.account.SignUpElement

  • public class SignUpElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages a standard sign up element of the registration form
    Author:
    Mattia Ruggiero

      • SignUpElement

        public SignUpElement(android.content.Context context,
             ElementName name,
             ElementInputType inputType,
             boolean required)
        Constructor that takes all the fields of the class
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        name - the name of the element, chosen by the names of the "ElementName" enum
        inputType - the input type of the element, chosen by the "ElementInputType" enum
        required - true if this element is required to complete the sign up process, false otherwise
